title: proofofconcept PoC attack
extract: Definition of: PoC exploit. PoC exploit. (Proof Of Concept exploit) An attack against a computer or network that is performed only to prove that it can be done. It generally does not cause any harm, but shows how a hacker can take advantage of a vulnerability in the software or possibly the hardware.
extract_html: Definition of: PoC exploit. PoC exploit. (Proof Of Concept exploit) An attack against a computer or network that is performed only to prove that it can be done. It generally does not cause any harm, but shows how a hacker can take advantage of a vulnerability in the software or possibly the hardware.
